title: New: Moko – Summon The Strength
content:
“There are many laws, some of which I fight’, a couplet that smothers you close to the frontal lobe of this 21 year old artist from New Cross; this girl means business.

Summon The Strength is what looks like the debut single from Moko, and for a first track it really is a fully realised vision. What it has above all else is focus, one central idea, one groove – explore.

Watch the accompanying video below, and catch her at Dalston’s Birthdays on April 2.

Via disco naïveté
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
